ai_sprite.name: lamanite_king
ai_sprite.dialog: Mathoni was not fit to lead our people anymore. I have been pronounced king over the Lamanites. We do not wish a confrontation at this time, so depart with those who wish to go with you. But you are not welcome to return.

ai_sprite.name: guard2
ai_sprite.dialog: The king wishes to speak with you.

ai_sprite.name: guard2
ai_sprite.dialog: The king wishes to speak with you.
